Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

Mix the dry ingredients together in one bowl, and in a separate bowl, combine the wet ingredients and sugar. Alternate adding the dry mixture and coffee to the wet ingredients. Feel free to mix in shredded apple if desired.

Slightly modify the given step:
Spread the walnut-topped batter into the prepared baking dish and bake in the preheated oven until the cake is springy when touched lightly, for about 1 hour. Let the cake cool for approximately 15 minutes.
Whisk the flour, oatmeal, baking soda, baking powder, and salt together in a large bowl.
